title: Do you know the court or tribunal name - GOV.UK
question: Do you know the name of the court or tribunal?
hint: You can find the name of the court or tribunal on a letter, email or text from HM Courts and Tribunal Services (HMCTS).

answers.a2: I do not have the name

error.title: There is a problem
error.text: Field is blank - Select if you have the name or not
